name: Get task
query:
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_name, COALESCE(COUNT(m.sequence_no),0) AS total_movement
FROM task_list t
LEFT JOIN movement_list m ON t.task_id = m.task_id
GROUP BY t.task_id, t.task_name
order by task_id;

name: create array
Insert data task
query:
INSERT INTO task_list (task_name)
Values ('{{msg.task_name}}')

name: Update data task
query:
UPDATE task_list 
SET task_name = '{{msg.task_name}}'
WHERE
task_id = {{msg.task_id}}

name: Delete data task
query:
DELETE FROM task_list 
WHERE
task_id = {{msg.task_id}} and task_name = '{{msg.task_name}}'

name: Get data movement
query:

name: create array
Insert data movement
query:
INSERT INTO movement_list (task_id,
sequence_no,
sequence_id,
x_servo,
y_servo,
z1_servo,
z2_servo,
rotate_servo,
grip_servo,
delay,sequence_name,next_movement)

Values ({{msg.task_id}},
{{msg.sequence_no}},
'{{msg.sequence_id}}',
{{msg.x_servo}},
{{msg.y_servo}},
{{msg.z1_servo}},
{{msg.z2_servo}},
{{msg.rotate_servo}},
{{msg.grip_servo}},
{{msg.delay}},
'{{msg.sequence_name}}',
{{msg.next_movement}}
)

name: function 3
function 4
Update data movement
query:
UPDATE movement_list 
SET
x_servo = {{msg.x_servo}},
y_servo = {{msg.y_servo}},
z1_servo = {{msg.z1_servo}},
z2_servo = {{msg.z2_servo}},
rotate_servo = {{msg.rotate_servo}},
grip_servo = {{msg.grip_servo}},
delay = {{msg.delay}},
sequence_name = '{{msg.sequence_name}}',
next_movement = {{msg.next_movement}}
WHERE
sequence_id = '{{msg.sequence_id}}'

name: function 5
Delete data movement
query:
DELETE from movement_list 
WHERE
sequence_id = '{{msg.sequence_id}}'
